about_the_game:
Lunarpunk is the first Tower Attack ever made. A brand-new experience based on moving forward with your turrets to destroy the cosmic menace. You have a mission to accomplish, destroy the outer world enemies with the help of your turrets.

The enemies will come out from mysterious portals, and your main objective is to close them with your own magic. But this won't be easy, because the enemies will keep coming and coming until you reach the portals, increasing the difficulty of the game as soon as you keep moving forward.
Combining technology and magic, the turrets will use the power of magic to help you in your epic journey to overcome the greatest challenge your planet has ever faced, the collapse of your moon, Måne.




Welcome to Hoved
Venture into the capital of technology. The city where the greater minds of all humanity gather, epicenter of lunar technology and the birthplace of our protagonist. Travel through the streets and the diverse sceneries of the city while fighting an alien invasion!

Stop the Dark age
For centuries, Hoved scientists co-existed and improved the welfare of the capital thanks to the resources extracted from the moon, Måne, which has been used to create the perfect synthesis between magic and technology. However, everything comes to an end… Because of unknown reasons, the moon has started to crumble, striking the city with a meteor shower from its remains while mysterious portals summon an invading alien army… Can Iska Blagg stop the Dark age?




  • Unleash the devastating force of the Tower Attack: Experience a unique Tower Defense gameplay where you take control of the action all the time, always moving forward.

  • Upgrade your turrets: Increase the damage and power of your turrets by taking advantage of the plates and objects on the stage.

  • Unlock your full potential: Spend plates to use a variety of damage, defense and healing abilities to put an end to the alien threat.

  • Overcome hordes of enemies: Different types of enemies with unique patterns and abilities will attack you and the turrets endlessly until you destroy their portal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

Crush your enemies, develop new turrets, enhance those you have and try to overcome the crisis that desolates your world. Are you ready to push forward?
